name: GoodnightWithMotivationSuccessQuotes
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good night
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Need someone to say goodnight to you? Feeling lonely? Need some inspiration? Alexa is here and will make you feel loved.

Alexa can do anything for you, why not tell her goodnight too? She sure loves a good friend. Alexa can also motivate you and give you some very inspiring success quotes for you to think about when you go to sleep. It's a game changer! 

You'll forever sleep better knowing Alexa is there for you.

Say, "Goodnight" -------- to tell Alexa goodnight.

If you have unlocked the motivational pack,
Say, "success quote" -------- for a random success quote
If you need any help, say, "Help"

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Please leave a nice review if you like the game. We really appreciate it and it helps encourage us to keep working on more and better skills. If you ever get stuck, say, how to play or contact us at www.RiseX.io before leaving a 1* review.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
